channel.title: Recovering an Xbox Live account (need help)
channel.description: Welllllllllll.... I can't remember the passcode to my account, and my parents credit card that I used was replaced because they lost it. I asked my mom if she had the number anywhere and she said no. Does anyone have a list of all possible combinations for an Xbox live passcode (Its 4 chars, using X, Y, the directional pad (R, L, U, D), left trigger, and right trigger) that I can print out and waste my time trying them to get my account back?

I just made a new one.

you should rememeber it basically

item.title: Recovering an Xbox Live account (need help)
item.dc:creator: @master_con60 master con60
item.description:
@master_con60 wrote:

Well i do play xbox an aufull lot and i do also play xbox live ive had the same trouble before ive allways noticed to set an easy password like left left right right so you dont forget it ( that wasntit btw ) but there a combo if different ones u can use … but seing as tho its only 4 characters and 4 directions it is pretty easy for eg.

right up left down
right up left left
right up left up
right up left right
and so on with other combos if your wishing to cancel your account have your bank account stopping them take the money ( if u got year subsciription ur fucked ) if not try ringing customer care in any of your game manuels xbox customer care if all fails try xbox.com

Read full topic
